Blog.post: I feel totally Blerk today got a headache AF is on her way and all I want to do it go home get in my pjs and hide under the covers

Please DO this and send it back. It isn't hard, and it's great when you start to get people's answers back. Okay, here's what you're supposed to do...and try not to be LAME and spoil the fun. Copy (not forward) this entire e-mail and paste it onto a new e-mail that you will send. Change all of the answers so that they apply to you. Then, send this to a whole bunch of people you know *INCLUDING* the person who sent it to you. The theory is that you will learn a lot of little known facts about your friends. It is fun and easy. Remember to send it back to the person who sent it to you! 4 1. WHAT BOOK ARE YOU READING? Sin City its a CSI the tv series book 2. WHAT TIME IS IT NOW? 9.14 3. WHAT'S ON YOUR MOUSE BUTTONS ? my fingers 4. WHAT'S YOUR FAVOURITE BOARD GAME? The Game of Life 5. FAVOURITE MAGAZINE? Womens Weekly 6. BABIES? Soon 7. FAVOURITE SOUND? People laughing and being happy 8. WORST FEELING IN THE WORLD? Being alone 9. FIRST THING YOU THINK OF IN THE MORNING? ewwwwww up time already 10. FUTURE CHILD'S NAME: Georgia or Mercedes for girls and Dylan or well i dunno for boys 11. FAVOURITE COLOUR? Blue and yellow 12. WHAT IS MOST IMPORTANT IN YOUR LIFE? my Family 13. FAVOURITE FOOD? CHOCOLATE 14. IF YOU COULD PLAY AN INSTRUMENT, WHAT WOULD IT BE? harp 15. DO YOU LIKE TO DRIVE FAST? if im in a hurry yep 16. SLEEP WITH A STUFFED ANIMAL? Does my hubband count? 17. STORMS - COOL OR SCARY? Cool 18. WHAT TYPE WAS YOUR FIRST CAR? Holden Camira 19. THE ONE PERSON FROM YOUR PAST YOU WISH YOU COULD GO BACK AND TALK TO? My Grandma 20. FAVOURITE ALCOHOLIC DRINK? Beam and coke 21. WHAT'S IN THE TRUNK OF YOUR CAR? lots of crap 22. DO YOU EAT THE STEMS OF BROCCOLI? Yes 23. IF YOU COULD HAVE ANY JOB YOU WANTED WHAT WOULD IT BE? Craft shop owner 24. LEAST LIKELY TO RESPOND? Emma she sent it to me 25. EVER BEEN IN LOVE? Yes. 26. IS THE GLASS HALF EMPTY OR HALF FULL? Half empty 27. FAVOURITE MOVIE? ohh hard one ummmm Centre Stage 28. DO YOU TYPE WITH YOUR FINGERS ON THE RIGHT KEYS? Majority of the time 29. WHAT'S UNDER YOUR BED? Nothing we have a water bed 30. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE NUMBER? 13 31. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE SPORT TO WATCH? Rallying 32. SAY AT LEAST ONE NICE THING ABOUT THE PERSON WHO SENT THIS TO YOU? Shes a great online mate who knows how to cheer me up 33. IF YOU COULD BUILD A HOUSE ANYWHERE WHERE WOULD IT BE? in the country 34. WHAT'S YOUR FAVOURITE ARTICLE OF CLOTHING? my jeans 35. BEACH, MOUNTAINS OR CITY? Beach 36. TECHNOLOGY OR ART? Technology 37. COMEDY OR HORROR? A bit of both 38. FAVOURITE PHYSICAL FEATURE OF THE OPPOSITE SEX? Smile and butt lol 39. FAVOURITE TIME OF DAY? Home time 40. THE LAST CD YOU BOUGHT? Robbie Willams 41. WHAT'S YOUR FAVOURITE PLACE TO BE MASSAGED? back and feet 42. WHAT'S MOST IMPORTANT, STRONG IN MIND OR STRONG IN BODY? Strong in mind 43. WHAT TIME DO YOU WAKE UP IN THE MORNING? 6.50am 44. WHAT'S YOUR FAVOURITE KITCHEN ITEM? my tea pot and slow cooker 45. WHAT MAKES YOU REALLY ANGRY? incompetent people 46. WHICH DO YOU PREFER, SPORTS CAR OR SUV? car 47. DO YOU BELIEVE IN AFTERLIFE? Yep 48. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE SEASON? Summer 49. IF YOU COULD HAVE ONE SUPER POWER, WHAT WOULD IT BE? ESP 50. IF YOU HAVE A TATTOO, WHAT IS IT? Yes its on my left hip of a little devil 51. CAN YOU JUGGLE? No 52. WHAT'S YOUR FAVOURITE DAY? Friday 53. WHICH DO YOU PREFER SUSHI OR HAMBURGER? Hamburger 54. FROM THE PEOPLE YOU WILL EMAIL THIS TO, WHO'S MOST LIKELY TO RESPOND FIRST? geez depends how busy everyone is 55. WHO DID YOU RECEIVE THIS FROM? Emma 56. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE CARTOON? Simpsons 57. WHAT IS YOUR FAVOURITE MEAL? Roast Pork or Chinese 58. IF YOU COULD TAKE A VACATION ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD WHERE WOULD IT BE? Somewhere hot and tropical 59. DO YOU HAVE PETS? yes lol 2 puppies and two puddas and 3 fish

Why is it one day your man can be perfect then next day hes annoying the crap out of you? Hubby has just cracked the craps because we aren't going away this weekend we planed to NOT go away a few weeks ago as we couldn't afford it so I planned that we would go out with friends on saturday night instead but oh no we can't do that we cant afford to BAH he is such a pain in the arse some days. I now feel guilty that we arent going away to this stupid rally cause hes made me feel that way and thats WRONG. Is it wrong that I dont want to spend over 4 hours in a car to some dusty crap hole to spend my long weekend? GRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRRR I thinks hes PMSing lol
Welcome to the world of Mrs Neesy. I dunno how insiteful this experience is going to be so sit down and hang on your in for one bumpy ride =)

Breakfast - 2 pieces of toast with Vegimite and a cuppa Cookies and cream tea Lunch - Ham and salad roll and a OJ with added iron Dinner - Wok in a box sweet and sour Snacks - 1 WW apricot pie, 1 99% FF Yoghurt Drinks - 1 375ml Coke, 750mls of water

Breakfast - 3 weetbix with skinny milk and a touch of sugar Lunch - Homemade Pea & Ham Soup & a wholemeal roll Dinner - Pork spare ribs, sweet potato chips and onion on the BBQ Snacks - WW Apricot Pie, 4 picklets, 1 tub Yoplait 99%FF yoghurt french cheesecake flavour Drinks - 1 hightlight hot chocolate 99%FF, 750ml of water, 375ml can of coke
The whole weekend was pretty much a right off LOL between desserts pork crackling, lots of coke and soft drinks i was BAD back on the wagon on tuesday
Breakfast: 2 Slices of Toast & Vegemite & and glass of OJ Lunch:Damer Roll with Ham and a 375ml Coke Dinner:Singapore Noodle stir fry Snacks:WW Apricot Pie Drinks: 1 Hightlight chocolate drink 99% FF

Breakfast - 2 slices of toast with apricot jam and a glass of OJ Lunch - Damper roll with Ham and corn relish Dinner - 1 Prawn Cocktail, We shared a special fired rice, chicken satay and crispy sweet chilli beef Snacks - 1 Weight watchers apricot pie, 1 weight watchers peaches, 1 Weight watchers chocolate moose. Drinks - 1 cup of white tea 2 sugars, 1 lemon lime & bitters, 750ml water

Well on the advice and inspiration of the lovely Portess I have also decided to keep and weight loss blog to "keep myself real' At the moment I weight 72 kgs and would like to get down to 65kgs so here we go wish me luck
